title: How to Get 10,000 Additional G's in Harvest Moon Another Wonderful Life

steps.headline: Insert one of the controllers in the first controller hole; if you're already playing, it should be there anyway.
steps.description: Insert the other controller in the 3rd controller hole.

steps.headline: Turn on the Gamecube and start up Harvest Moon: Another Wonderful Life.
Make sure you aren't paused or on any type of menu; you're just standing around.
Press the Start button as many times as you please on the 3rd controller.
steps.description: Every time you press Start, it adds 10,000 G to your pocket.

steps.headline: Use only one controller.
steps.description: Just switch the controller from the 1st to 3rd hole after starting up the game and proceed in cheating as usual.

steps.headline: When you are done, switch it back and continue the game.

text: You will need 2 Gamecube controllers.  Insert one of the controllers in the first controller hole; if you're already playing, it should be there anyway. Insert the other controller in the 3rd controller hole. Turn on the Gamecube and start up Harvest Moon: Another Wonderful Life.  Make sure you aren't paused or on any type of menu; you're just standing around.  Press the Start button as many times as you please on the 3rd controller. Every time you press Start, it adds 10,000 G to your pocket. Alternate Method:  Use only one controller. Just switch the controller from the 1st to 3rd hole after starting up the game and proceed in cheating as usual. When you are done, switch it back and continue the game.
